code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useParams,Link}from"react-router-dom";import PostForm from"./PostForm";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ChatPage(){const{raceId}=useParams();const[posts,setPosts]=useState([{id:1,type:"Selling",message:"Selling bib for Boston Marathon",user:"Alice"},{id:2,type:"Buying",message:"Looking for a bib for Chicago Marathon",user:"Bob"}]);const handleNewPost=newPost=>{setPosts([...posts,newPost]);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Chat for Race ID: ",raceId]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Back to Home"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:"20px"},children:posts.filter(post=>post.raceId===Number(raceId)||post.raceId===undefined).map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:"1px solid #ccc",padding:"10px",marginBottom:"10px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:post.type}),": ",post.message," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("em",{children:["- ",post.user]})]},post.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostForm,{raceId:Number(raceId),onNewPost:handleNewPost})]});}export default ChatPage;
